did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Fauquier County (Va.) Comprehensive Annual Financial Reports, 1995-2011
did.physloc: State Records Center - Archives Annex, Library of Virginia

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Fauquier County (Va.) Comprehensive Annual Financial Reports, 1995-2011. Local government records collection, Fauquier County Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in a transfer of papers from Fauquier County under the accession number 50539.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Fauquier County was named for Francis Fauquier, lieutenant governor of Virginia from 1758 to 1768. It was formed from Prince William County in 1759 and the county seat is Warrenton.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Fauquier County (Va.) Comprehensive Annual Financial Reports, 1995-2011, consists of annual fiscal year reports of county government and school finances conducted by an independent auditing company.

controlaccess.head: Genre and Form Terms:
controlaccess.genreform: Local government records -- Virginia -- Fauquier County.
